## isJsonExprReference() function

Checks if the given value is a reference to a definition.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isJsonExprReference(value: any): value is JsonExprReference;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | The value of a technique property. |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is [JsonExprReference](./harp-datasource-protocol.jsonexprreference.md)
